participant_1.background:
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.
I'm a car enthusiast searching for a quiet, private home with plenty of space for my vintage cars.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
I am a fourth child who was once lucky enough to swim with manta rays.
I'm interested in learning more about how to raise my kids on my own.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i like listening to blues music.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well. Thank you for asking.
I'm glad to hear that. What are you up to today?
Not much, just writing a story. I'm hoping to get published someday.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do it. What kind of stories do you write?
I write mostly fantasy and science fiction. I love creating new worlds and characters.
That sounds really cool! I've always been a big fan of fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone else who enjoys it.
Me too! What are some of your favorite fantasy and science fiction books and movies?
I love the Lord of the Rings series, Harry Potter series, and the Game of Thrones series.
Those are all great! I love them too.
What are some of your favorite books and movies?
I love the Star Wars series, the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and the Harry Potter series.
Those are all great! I love them too.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we're friends.
Me too! I'm glad you're my friend.
